website_summaries.verdict: Durable, organized case makes this quality crochet kit easy to travel with.
pros: Thick, gel-like, rubber handles make crochet hooks easy and comfortable to hold
Kit comes in a convenient soft zipper case that’s perfect for travel and has plenty of organizational pockets
Comes with additional tools like darning needles, scissors, and stitch markers
cons: Rubber grip sometimes slides around the crochet hooks

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made product.
customer_reviews.text: These are advertised as being helpful for arthritis, but the handle is too thin. You need a thicker handle when you have arthritis. Also they are advertised as being "premium" and this whole set is cheap quality. The cheap plastic zipper in the case probably isn't going to last long. I am disappointed. It looks nice in the picture, but it's just cheap. As you can see in the picture the green Boye hook on the left is thicker around than the one that comes in this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Pandora

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This case would work for a beginner or for any crocheter who wants to get more organized. I’ve been crocheting for almost 10 years, and I always loose my hooks. Since I bought this set, I haven’t lost a single one. They aren’t the fanciest hooks, but they work well and the grip feels good. I put the hooks I found at home in the case too. The rest of the tools in the kit all work great. I like that the scissors are foldable. I also like that the center zippered pouch is removable. (Just be careful when you take it out, because I accidentally broke the mesh where it attached to the snap. My fault)
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Received severely damaged
customer_reviews.text: I should have listened to my guts after reading the reviews. The crochet hooks are smaller than I expected. But worse than the size... I received this severely damaged. One of the hooks is bent 45 degrees but curved. The case has a hole the size of a silver dollar and the case has so many bends and creases it affects the zipper. I wouldn’t do it if I were you. I don’t know how to add picture or I would.
customer_reviews.author: DMcC

customer_reviews.title: nice handles
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used mine yet but I did check out how the handles felt in my hands, I have arthritis in my fingers and these appear to going to use easier, I had trouble with my regular hooks sliding out of my hand and these looks like they should do the job . I will get back later on after I use them awhile on how well they worked. Shipping was nice, oh yes the case held up to being in mailbox overnight at minus 40 below and didn't crack or split meaning they are well made cases. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Donna Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully crafted case & the Hooks look amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set as a gift for my daughter who just recently learned to crochet. Unfortunately the regular hooks hurt her hands so she was considering buying some ergonomic hooks... The set came in two days & the packaging was good as the case was not damaged or dented/bent or crushed. I love the multi-colored hooks & I hope they ease my daughters hand pain when she uses them. I will have to report back once she uses them as I don't crochet & can't report on their comfort level. So far I'm very pleased with the vendors promptness, the look of the set & the price was a real value!
customer_reviews.author: Hammerhead24

customer_reviews.title: For Serious Enthusiasts
customer_reviews.text: I just received this set yesterday from my husband. Love it. Normally my crotchet hooks are in a zip lock in a tote bag. I love the kit! It comes with many accessories I've never had before and Tthe hooks are shaped to fit nicely in your hand. This set will up my game, definitely.... I'm even going to buy a yarn bag to go with the kit. Looking forward to making more than scarves, blankets and other flat rectangular items! I can't wait to try the tools and know they'll expand my creativity. The nice handles on the hooks make them seem so comfortable- for me, the kit is a game changer and I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Van Tassel

customer_reviews.title: Crochet kit with padded crochet needles
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the way this kit was assembled. It contains rubber coated crochet needles, a guage for stitch length, small plastic safety pins, instructions and more. The case is nicely built, it resembles it small book with an easy to open/close zipper closure. There is a smaller zippered pouch inside to hold the pins and other small articles. The needles fit into elastic slots, one for each needle. The needles are marked in a letter and metric number to correspond to any pattern directions. This would be a great gift for a crafter who travels or for a beginner crocheter.
customer_reviews.author: Linda D. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I was about a quarter way through a project when I received these hooks. After using them for a few rows I found that my tension had improved so much that I started over. These are great hooks to work with. My project is finished. Yes the rubber started to come off once but after pushing it back on it stayed in place. The accessories are nice EXCEPT the folded scissors. Cannot get one side to open and the side that did open will not close. I didn't buy this product for the accessories so keeping the 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: mum

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy these!
customer_reviews.text: The accessories and the case these hooks came with are wonderful but the hooks themselves are horrible! If you crochet a lot do not buy these, they get stuck very easily and I had to actually go out and buy different ones. They were literally tearing apart my yarn and ruining my project I was working on. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a good set!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used these yet as I just received them today. I have never crocheted before and I am really wanting to learn, that's why I bought this set. I am including pics of what it looked like when I first opened it and what it contains in the zipper pocket inside. The items laying outside the case are what was in the inside zippered pocket. I have read a lot of reviews that say there is a problem with the rubber handles slipping off while in use, but I imagine that a glue gun would possibly help with this issue. I can't wait to use these and I love the cute zippered polka-dot case. I got the blue one.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I'm a new knitter and seem to drop stitches everywhere. If that wasn't bad enough, the poorly made crochet needles I purchased to pick up up those stitches just made matters worse: they caught on, snarled and split the yarn. What a mess! I decided to give these crochet hooks a try and what a difference! They slide between the stitches like butter. I hope someday soon my knitting will improve, but even then I'll be glad to have this lovely set of crochet hooks (just in case).
customer_reviews.author: NMJacoby

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: I use these to do all my crocheting Now they are easy for my hands. I also told a friend about them and she ordered a set. They are easy to hold and with my arthritis it makes it much better because you are not trying to grip them so tight that you can’t do much because your hands hurt with these it is not that way you don’t have to grip them tight at all. I really like them and want to thank you for such a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: D.T.

customer_reviews.title: Hooks not the best
customer_reviews.text: The case is nice and it comes with lots of goodies that are nice for travel, however, the hooks are not deep enough to catch the yarn for a good flow. I used them for about thirty minutes before I wondered what was wrong with my yarn as it kept catching. I switched to the Susan Bates and it went fine. I have not decided if I will send them back but I do know I won't be using the hooks.
customer_reviews.author: pat mingKindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are ultra comfortable to use.  Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: They came today. I laid aside my old Boyle hook (so hard to use as I get older and stiffer) and tried these for the first time. So comfortable to hold! So smooth! I worked on the project all evening. I'm delighted! Now, the offer to get an ebook and register for lifetime warranty..... that's not worked at all. But the hooks and the items included are great.
customer_reviews.author: FestiveWarrior

customer_reviews.title: Pain Free Crocheting with Ergonomic Crochet Hooks
customer_reviews.text: The ergonomic crochet hooks set is beautiful. The zippered case is pretty and well made. This was supposed to be a gift. After I tried one hook out, I couldn't part with them. I don't get muscle cramps in my fingers from using these crochet hooks. The shaft is smooth so the yarn flows smoothly. The hook is ample so there is no difficulty grabbing the yarn. It took a little getting used to, but now I wouldn't use any other type of hook.
customer_reviews.author: Jacque Dooley

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cushioned handles
customer_reviews.text: I love these hooks! My wrists and hands are starting to lose their mobility but these hooks are so much easier to hold and the grip keeps me from having to grip them tightly which significantly reduced my hand fatigue. The accessories they come with are all extremely useful and I especially like the stitch counter. I also received a nice thank you email from this shop which, in addition to the quality of this product, is why I'll be buying from becraftee again.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie W.

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves the set!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife as I got tired of her losing/leaving all of her hooks everywhere in the house. Not only does this come with all the hooks she uses, she loves the grip on them and the case also comes with all sorts of other goodies that she needs for all her projects. Nice convenient storage for everything all in one easy-to-carry case.
customer_reviews.author: AndreD.

customer_reviews.title: Superb Product
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this set. The case is very attractive and very well made. Although I just started using them, the crochet hooks seem to be well-made; so I expect no durability problems at all. I have RA and these hooks are extremely comfortable to use. I love the entire package. Everything you get in this set will see you well supplied with the items you need to crochet anything you want to crochet. This set is also very reasonably priced. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: JLF

customer_reviews.title: Great! Numbers a bit off...
customer_reviews.text: They arrived and within a minute, I am back to speed with NO pain! LOVE these already. Sizing is a bit off as they go by UK measurements. Like my G says it is 4.25 and their G is 4.0. But it is close enough not to throw off my gauge. YAY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Ergonomic Crochet Hooks by the BeCreativeStore at Amazon are the way to go!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these Ergonomic crochet hooks from "BeCreativeStore" on Amazon!!!! I have moderate/severe athritis in my dominant right hand. These special hooks allow me to crochet longer on a project...because I ALWAYS have more than 1 crochet project going for over 50 years now!!! I love these new products that are coming out!!! YAY, to the "BeCreativeStore" on AMAZON!!! And I would like to add the cost is definitely affordable!!! Have FUN!!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a great crochet kit to have around the house. I liked the first one so much that I bought a second for travel. I am a part time crocheter and tend to lose hooks, so it is good to have everything I need in one place. Only problem is the hook size wears off after a lot of use. I just made sure I reapplied the size to the handle when that happened.
customer_reviews.author: Susana

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: I am a beginning crocheter. I ordered this set because the thin plastic and aluminum handles hooks were hard on my hands. These were rated well, and at an excellent price point. I've been using one to make my first project (a washcloth), and it appears to be going well. I'm having a little problem with the yarn sticking and splitting, but I'm fairly sure it's the yarn and not the hook. Since I don't have a lot of experience with different hook products, I can't comment as an expert, but so far I'm pretty darned happy!
customer_reviews.author: Scout Leader

customer_reviews.title: Great for on the go!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this particular set for my mother, but I received the same set as gift earlier in the year. I am in love with this set. They are super comfortable for my hands and work well. They also help me to be able to crochet just a little bit longer than I usually can with a regular hook, due to my arthritis and the cyst on my tendon. I would recommend these hooks for anyone who has hand troubles.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Real hand saver!
customer_reviews.text: Love this set. Been using old style hooks & they make my hands hurt. I have neck issues so my grip is not as good as it once was. Love all the extras that are included. Although not sure about the row counter didn’t seem to work. Not a big deal. I have started gifts for my nieces & grandchildren. Crotchet pillows with their names so I have my work cut out for me. These needles are easy to use & don’t hurt my hands. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel H.

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality!!
customer_reviews.text: As a starter kit, it would be nice if this game with a little starter book with some beginner patterns as I bought that separately anyway. However, YouTube has a lot of helpful videos that worked well also. What came in this pack was so useful though, and keeps everything really accessible and well organized. These are the preferred types of hooks as well, with the comfort handles and metal tips.
customer_reviews.author: Corissa H.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful crotchet set!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful crotchet set! This was a Christmas gift. I have carpal tunnel and using these allows me to crotchet pain free and with ease. Great quality and feels good in may hands. It's an adorable, well equipped little kit. I like the case and the colors of the grip handles. Overall, I'm very happy with it. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this set!
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with this beginner's crochet set for its quality and all that it contains - its everything i need for crocheting my first blanket. The ergonomic handles are comfortable, there are plenty of stitch markers, the yarn snips are nice and sharp, and the handy carry case zips up nicely and slips right inside my crochet satchel. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JBau

customer_reviews.title: Great all-around crochet kit to get started!
customer_reviews.text: Nice kit to keep all the little things you did not know you may need, and you will, to get started as a beginner, like myself. It comes in a nice zippered case, as indicated. The accessory bag inside is attached by snaps and can be removed for easy access while working on your project. Really enjoy this all around kit!
customer_reviews.author: kokoemo

customer_reviews.title: Buy these hooks.
customer_reviews.text: After paying over $5 each for 2 hooks in the craft store, I took a chance on this set. Have used 2 of the hooks and am over joyed! The handles are extremely comfortable. I didn’t find any rough spots on the hooks. The accessories are an added bonus, because the hooks alone are such an amazing bargain. The case, is much better for keeping tools organized than trying to find them in the last tote bag used to carry your work. It’s not leather but, again, is a bonus. Buy these hooks.
customer_reviews.author: MJ2trip

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: This set has everything you need for crochet; scissors, measuring device, stitch markers, needles, everything. It's great for taking on the plane when I travel. Much less bulky than my other set, and the crochet hooks are very comfortable. This would make a great gift for anyone who crochet's. I would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Laura H.

customer_reviews.title: Handles get very sticky while using!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this kit; attractive "packaging" for kit. Only problem I have is that the handles get very sticky after a while, and I have to stop often and wash them. I don't put lotion on my hands while crocheting, and my hands don't perspire; so I don't know what crochet handles to become sticky, unless it's just the type of rubber/latex? used in making the handles. Other than - nice product!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Baker

customer_reviews.title: Not for professionals, beginners only.
customer_reviews.text: As bad as my mother wanted to like them, she just couldn’t. She makes clothing and sells them on Etsy, she was excited about the grips... however they are so cheaply made they’d never hold up to the work she does and amount. Returned on the 2nd day. Maybe better for a beginners and def not professionals.
customer_reviews.author: oxoclaudine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for anyone that crochets.
customer_reviews.text: The set is not only amazingly comfortable but also adorable! I think it’d make a terrific gift. And I love that it has included so many items that I’m usually hunting for, and so perfectly contained in one cute zippered case. Thank you for such a great design.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie A Stewart

customer_reviews.title: What a Deal!
customer_reviews.text: I recently joined a knitting/crocheting circle and I was referred to watch a you tube video for beginners. These were very similar to what the teacher had in his video. They are easy to hold and easier for my arthritis in my hands. I also love all the other items in this case. Came in really handy!
customer_reviews.author: KAREN N Kaltsas

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CASE... unimpressive hooks
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two cute ergonomic crochet hook sets, with the intention of deciding which to keep and sending the other back. Sadly, both were disappointing. The hooks in this set felt cheap and the rubber just slides off, but the case was really cute and sturdy. The other set had fantastic hooks, but a really disappointing case. I'm returning both and ordering the good hooks (Athena's Elements) by themselves, because they really were fantastic. I'll just order a sturdy case separately.
customer_reviews.author: americayay

customer_reviews.title: Best impulse buy ever
customer_reviews.text: It came so fast i almost thought i selected the wrong shipping option! Hooks are made of metal and the rubber handles are strong and durable (survived being chewed on by a 6month old puppy) the ergonomic handles really do help with carpal tunnel and hand cramping. well worth the price! good sized case, holds everything you could want and accessories are good quality. the stitch markers in particular are very well made and the folding scissors are very sharp and very strong. definitely worth the price and 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Great softer hook handles for less pain when crocheting with arthritis.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this crochet hook set. The quality is higher than i expected for the price. The handles are nicely cushioned and proportioned. The hook portion is nicely angled and snag free. I just wish the hooks were polished to a smoother finish. They are not rough but my Addi hooks are more polished and are "quicker." The case is lovely and the the accessories are appreciated and the scissors are actually sharp!
customer_reviews.author: aputerlady

customer_reviews.title: Quality at a value price
customer_reviews.text: I just picked crocheting back up a couple of years ago after many years. I noticed that I was having pain in my forearms and elbows. I decided to try out these ergonomic crochet hooks and I'm glad I did! I've only been using them for a few weeks but I can tell a difference. These are very easy to hold, very comfortable. The portfolio that the hooks come in are cute with a lot of extras inside. I am very pleased with this purchase considering I was just going to try them out before buying more expensive ones....why bother? These are great!
customer_reviews.author: KADISO17

customer_reviews.title: but the hooks feel really comfortable in my hand
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for me and one for a friend as a gift, we both want to learn crochet. I know nothing about crochet at this point so I can't compare them to others, but the hooks feel really comfortable in my hand, nice and soft and not too big around as to be too bulky. And the case is nice and firm with everything organized inside. Even the little bits and pieces have their own pouch. Can't wait to get started!
customer_reviews.author: Kitterkat

customer_reviews.title: Great crochet hooks!
customer_reviews.text: Great crochet hook set! In fact I even went back and ordered another one cuz I'm always leaving my hooks in a tote with my latest project. Sometimes I have a project at home & another left at my kids house to work on when I am babysitting grandchildren. Always seemed like the hooks were in the wrong place!! Since they aren't that expensive the best solution was to have two. The easy grip handles are something new for me but so far I like them. Quick arrival and overall very pleased with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: The handles have this great texture to them that isn't slippery so you don't ...
customer_reviews.text: This is worth every. single. penny. I can crochet for hours without my hands hurting. The handles have this great texture to them that isn't slippery so you don't have to grip them very hard and they still stay in your hands, unlike the typical metal ones you can buy at Jo-Ann's. I would've paid more just for the hooks alone so the case and added goodies in there are a total bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle J.

customer_reviews.title: A beginner looking to learn!
customer_reviews.text: Being in this crazy world of staying inside my home and not venturing outside I found that I REALLY needed to do something and that something must be something new to challenge me -- even a little bit. I have been known to knit every once in a while but crochet -- nah. These hooks came faster than I expected -- and are just right for this newbie to start to learn this technique. Thank you for the excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Wellness Advocate

customer_reviews.title: Cute case, BUT
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased with the cute red polka dot case these hooks came in, and there are certainly a lot of goodies inside. But the imprint on some of the hooks was already smudged and coming off. They’re labeled with ink, not carved into the handle. This tells me that the hooks won’t stay labeled for long, so I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie Dea

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and useful!
customer_reviews.text: I love this set! The hooks are comfortable and brightly colored so they are easy to distinguish and hold. The case is hard, not soft. It is sturdy and cute! I really like the extras on the inside, like yarn needles, and the organization pocket that the case has for all of these little tools.
customer_reviews.author: R. Duzan

customer_reviews.title: Great set - mom loves it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my elderly mom and she loved it. I must explain this is the third set i bought her and she did not like the first two which were a different brand. According to her, the ends or heads made this set "the best ever" and she loved it . She also really likes the softer handles which made them more comfortable. The case was an extra bonus keeping everything together. I should have got this one first.
customer_reviews.author: Combat Medic

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for my arthritic hands
customer_reviews.text: Initially, I purchased another brand. The handles were too long for my small hands & the shafts kept snagging the yarn so I returned them & purchased these. Love everything about them, including the handy storage case. I have small & getting worse arthritic hands. These are much more comfortable than the regular metal ones & even the ones with flat handles. Enjoying these very much!
customer_reviews.author: Angela E.

customer_reviews.title: All supplies you need are included.
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this set 10 stars, I would. Everything a crocheter needs is here, compactly organized in a practical quality case. Size of case is just right. Excellent selection of different sized hooks. Will buy additional sets for my crocheting friends. Wish I had this earlier!
customer_reviews.author: Astra

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly for me!
customer_reviews.text: The hooks work well and the case is holding up nicely so far. I especially like the little pouch that has foldable scissors, some stich markers and needles. I travel alot, so I can pick up this case and a ball of yarn or latest project and be ready to go. My only problem is leaving a hook with a project I'm working on (i usually have 2 or 3) and then forgetting where I put it. I may get another one so that I can have them in different places.
customer_reviews.author: TLBQ

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Difference in the sizes are so minute that it's not worth buying the multi-size pack.
customer_reviews.author: Original Settler

customer_reviews.title: Very nice crochet hook set!
customer_reviews.text: Quality is excellent. Very fun case. Ergonomic hooks. I bought as a gift for a lady who lives alone during this Covid-19 stay-at-home period, with a Afghan kit. Almost didn’t give it away because it was so beautiful. Fast delivery. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DURABLE, COMFORTABLE & CUTE
customer_reviews.text: This set has everything I expected. I originally bought it for someone else. You know what they say, buy something you like & they will love it! Well, I ended up keeping it. It’s so cute! Lol I keep in my crochet bag because it’s compact & durable enough to hold all the hooks, needles bits I need for my projects. The handles on the crochet hooks are very comfortable to hold with no fatigue. I’ve had this for quite some time now & it has not had an easy life but still looks like the day I bought it. I know where to go for my next set!
customer_reviews.author: CyndysZoo

customer_reviews.title: Cutest crochet kit ever
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleasantly surprised by the cuteness and sturdiness of this little kit. It's very well thought out, nicely compact, and had some wonderful little extras that I wasn't expecting, like a zipper pouch with stitch holders, stitch markers, and needles. I am really happy to have this for myself, but I also think it would make a superb gift for a needlecrafter.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Slate

customer_reviews.title: Best hook set for beginners...has everything you need to get started.
customer_reviews.text: I looked at several kits/sets of ergonomic crochet needles for myself as a beginner. This was the best deal which comes with high quality hooks and a complete kit with scissors, stitch markers, gauge, and large threading needles. the case is nice and sturdy. I highly recommend it for beginners looking for a good starting kit.
customer_reviews.author: Ruthie

customer_reviews.title: Buy this if you want to throw your money away
customer_reviews.text: These don’t seem to be made to be used by anyone who crochets. This appears to be a product that was made just for show. They are poorly made, not very sturdy. Not nice to hold. The zipper came off when I opened it the first time. The whole thing is very shoddy. Well, there were a fairly decent pair of scissors in it. Lucky for me I accidentally bought it twice.
customer_reviews.author: Dapriga

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with this set of crochet hooks!
customer_reviews.text: The set has a wonderful holder and it fits very nicely on top of my yarn in my bag. It has everything a beginner needs to learn to crochet without spending a lot of money. PERFECT! Love the hooks. They are comfortable and that is very important to my arthritic hands.
customer_reviews.author: Cintris

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: I am an avid crochet fan. I make items to sell, as well as many gifts. Before I discovered these ergonomic crochet needles, my hands and wrists constantly hurt. I now can crochet hours on end without pain. They have helped me tremendously. I also would like to comment on this company's customer service. I bought this set one year ago. Sadly some of the handles have started slipping off the metal needles. I contacted the seller and they responded immediately and offered to replace them. This is what we need more of: companies who stand by their products and care about the customers!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Inspiration can come in the color RED
customer_reviews.text: Got the case, the color was red with white polka dots (this was important because I also got the bag which was red and the the interior lined with red and white polka dots). The case was well made for the price and I have finally decided to finish that scarf I had put aside about 2 years ago :) This cute set has inspired me! Thanks BeCraftee
customer_reviews.author: To the point

customer_reviews.title: Great crochet hook value!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a handy and compact set for a crocheter-on-the-go! I have rather small hands, so I appreciate that the ergo-handles aren't so large with these. There are so many little tools in the included pouch. (I actually used the stitch counter to help me keep track of which episode I was on with my GOT binge watching...LOL!) Great set for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Creative Lady

customer_reviews.title: HANDY CROCHET KIT
customer_reviews.text: I LIKE EVERYTHING ABOUT THIS HANDY PRODUCT. I AM A BEGINNING CROCHET ENTHUSIAST AND THIS KIT INCLUDES ALL I WILL NEED TO GET STARTED ON MY NEW HOBBY. THANK YOU FOR SENDING IT SO FAST AND IN GREAT CONDITION. SANDY HATTON
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Hatton

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: These crochet hooks are great. It's easy to read the size on each hook, and they are much more comfortable than my other metal hooks. The case is convenient for moving my supplies from place to place. Overall it is very well made. The little center snap broke from the center pouch but the vendor was extremely responsive to my email and sent a new free replacement kit. It was a good experience. I would recommend the kit and would order from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these crochet hooks for the softer handles and they are very nice for arthritic hands. Before I even received them, I received a personal note from Maddy, the woman who heads up this company, thanking me for my purchase. The case holds all of your hooks in addition to scissors, stitch markers, and a handy measuring tool that are included! There was a small issue with the markings on the hooks and Maddy responded quickly to resolve it. I love the personal touch. Great customer service! I would buy from BeCreative again.
customer_reviews.author: C J.

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift, so I cannot confirm anything about use. Set arrived exactly as described. The recipient was excited and liked the carrying case a great deal especially with the little kit inside. She travels a lot and takes her crocheting with her everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Crochet Convenience
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful crochet kit. Everything you need is in this compact holder. I would buy this again. Love it because I habe another kit with missing sizes in hooks. This is a complete set of things I used constantly.👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ergonomics are great.
customer_reviews.text: As I get older, I find that I need more ergonomic items in order to continue crocheting. These fit the bill to a tee and the fact that I get the most used hooks is indeed a plus. The additional items are a complete surprise and ones that I need as well and having them all in such a pretty case that I can find easily at the bottom of my current project totally rocks. I highly recommend them. (just finished a baby blanket with one of the hooks and counter and loved them.)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set of hooks!
customer_reviews.text: These are really great for hands that get sore fast while crocheting. And my daughter, who's 10, even liked using them as she learned to crochet. I find they keep the yarn in place on the hook, making it easier to learn new stitches.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah KD

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable crocheting
customer_reviews.text: It's a complete set of all crochet hook sizes and tools needed for crocheting. All are organized into a portable carrying case allowing easy storage and accessibility. Each hook is padded enough for comfort and movement for arthritic or hands that have had recent surgery, like mine.
customer_reviews.author: blluengold

customer_reviews.title: These hooks are no longer than plain metal hooks.
customer_reviews.text: The description said they were longer. Not true. They are a quarter inch shorter. than my current hooks. I have bad hands and need a longer tool. That was the only reason I ordered this set ! But it is a beautiful set and would make a great gift. If it were not for my bad hands I would love it.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic crochet hook set
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased these for my mom for a Mother's Day gift. She loved them and was immediately jealous of the product. Not only is the case adorable, the hooks perfect, you can also actually get them in and out of the case easily. We have been taking a crochet class together and all the other women were also jealous of this find, including the instructor. Now I'm waiting for mine to arrive. Far better than anything you will find at Michael's, and lots cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: E. Westmoreland

customer_reviews.title: Very smooth and comfy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new hook set! My old ones were the run of the mill plain aluminum in some truly hideous colors. These are much nicer. They are very comfortable to work with and come in a neat little carrying case. In addition to the hooks, the package includes anything you might need to get started right away (I was very happy to have some extra stitch markers and darning needles). They are smooth and I have had no issues at all with them catching on the yarn, even with the smaller sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Amy O.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but not very good
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this twice. The first one I received the middle compartment did not button in, it was off center so I sent back. The second one I received was not sewn properly and string was all over the outside by the zipper. Holding the hooks are comfortable, but trying to keep the yarn on the hook it just slides right off.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Love this set! Bought 1 as a gift for a friend & she loved it so much I bought a second ome for me. Nice little covered case with ergonomic crochet needles is varying sizes, scissors, stitch holder & stitch counter. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Bekke

customer_reviews.title: Hooks Cleary Marked with # and Millimeter sizing in black.
customer_reviews.text: Like that the hooks are marked with both # size and millimeter size in black on end of each hook. Good assortment of colors along with ruler and foldable scissors Everything you need in a handy carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne T. Kundra

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, easy to use, helpful!
customer_reviews.text: I have had my eye on this set for awhile! The hooks feel great in my hand and are super easy to hold and use. I have regular slim hooks and have often gotten had cramps using them but with these I haven't! So easy to use and comfortable. I love the storage case and all the extra pieces you get as well. Keeps everything contained in one area.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: How hook handles
customer_reviews.text: I love these crochet hooks! I love how it feels while crocheting. Easy grip, have all the materials needed for a beginner. Travels well in one zipper pouch. It has a center zipper pouch for all the extras we need. I call it “ my one stop shop crochet pouch”. ENJOYING IT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: The only needles you'll need
customer_reviews.text: Love this kit, comes with literally everything you'll need for any crochet product. The needles are high quality and have a good weight to them; not too heavy, but they got some substance so they're easy to find in a mess of yarn. Good grip, I like the rubber around the ends, it flattens very nicely for comfortable finger grips. Lastly, the case is well built and has gone through a lot with me and shows literally no wear or tears.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Love this convenient little kit.
customer_reviews.text: This kit was just what I was hoping for. The handles on the hooks are comfortable and the depth of the hook makes crocheting easier for me. I like having all the tools I need tucked into one small kit that I can easily throw in my knitting/crochet bag and carry along with me. And I love polka dots so the kit is adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Megha

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased two of these sets. Unfortunately, the first set I lost while traveling, and had to use the ones I've inherited from my mom and sisters. I really could tell the difference. My fingers and hands would HURT and wake me up in the middle of the night. These ergonomic hooks are fantastic, my fingers and hands can really tell the difference. No hurt, no pain, no numbness. AWESOME!! PS: Love the case too, everything all in one place!
customer_reviews.author: B's Pain Free

customer_reviews.title: "Keeps me organized and looking professional!"
customer_reviews.text: I'm writing this review for my mother, who received this as a gift over Christmas. She loves the cute bag. She says the gift keeps her organized and looking professional. She loves having access to the various tools. It's easy to carry with her everywhere she goes.
customer_reviews.author: A. Vu

customer_reviews.title: great set!
customer_reviews.text: This set of crochet hooks is great for me because I am left-handed. I like how everything is complete in this one little case. The handles make these comfortable to hold and are a slight bit shorter than my other crochet hooks which makes them easier to use. All of the included accessories are great. I like that everything fits so neatly into this case so that I have all that I need right at my fingertips. I bought a bin/tote for my afghan project and this set fits right in with the wool and instructions and I am ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I received these promptly after ordering. It is not cheaply made. I pulled all the items out and everything but the stitch counter thing-y was good quality and I look forward to using. I'm using the 5.5 hook on my current project and, although it handles differently than my plain aluminium hook, I find it works well. Once I get used to it, I'm sure I'll be able to pick up speed on it. The case and pouches seem well-made and sturdy and I'm looking forward to many years of use. Thank you for providing a set of ergo hooks in a case with goodies --- it's just what I needed!!
customer_reviews.author: Delia Call

customer_reviews.title: Nice to hold
customer_reviews.text: Very nice hooks to hold, no more sore fingers from metal hooks. Love having a case to keep them all in. Don't count on using the stitch counter, it's a cheap little thing. But everything else seems good.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Good value and product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set because I have fibromyalgia and arthritis and I thought they would help. So far they are very good. Comfortable to use and I crochet a LOT for my etsy shop so I need to keep being able to do it. I love the organized case and all the little extras that come with it. It will be easy to take with me to work on projects. The bright red color makes it easy to find in my project bag too. I am going to get another set for my now too.
customer_reviews.author: Dmc

customer_reviews.title: These are great but since I am getting older my hand started ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a beginner to crochet. I started with a set bought from Michael's by the Crochet Guy. These are great but since I am getting older my hand started to cramp after a couple hours of crocheting. So I tried this ergonomic set and have never been happier. My hand no longer cramps and I enjoy sitting in the living room crocheting. So far I have finished one scarf and am 1/2 done with another. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Linda W

customer_reviews.title: It's ok👍
customer_reviews.text: I wish there were a couple more larger hooks...would be better for the beginner. I will keep it tho and work with it. There is also many smaller things that came with it and no directions but I went on YouTube for tutorials.
customer_reviews.author: Peachy43

customer_reviews.title: Great kit/hooks (except one defective hook)
customer_reviews.text: The crochet hooks and kit are great, easy to hold and are exactly what I was looking for. My one complaint is that one of the hooks was a little defective. In the picture you can see that the top and side of the hook with the pink handle were not filed down correctly and that thin strip of metal at the top catches on the yarn. The rest of the hooks were in perfect condition and the kit was as described. I'm satisfied over all!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Set! Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set that had everything I needed and still looks brand new after all of this time! I have RA and I'm very happy to say the handles are excellent and don't bother my hands as quickly as other needles have in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Maria R

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely loved everything about this
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved everything about this. The hooks have long enough shank and the case is very durable. The accessories are all included so you are ready to go. I had previously bought the ergonomic set by Boye in the pink case for the same price but the shanks were too short and the case difficult to open and didn't include any accessories. This is a far better bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Great value for Complete set of Crochet Hooks
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful set for the beginner as well as the experienced crocheter. Easy to hold so that your hand and fingers do not tire. Thank you for the assortment.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy R. Clear

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Hooks!
customer_reviews.text: I am teaching myself to crochet and the aluminum hooks were not very comfortable for me. I didn't know if I could teach myself because I am left handed but that didn't feel comfortable either so I am teaching myself to crochet right handed. These hooks have made a world of difference! I am taking it slow but I am very happy happy with these hooks. The grips are so comfortable and make moving the hook a lot easier than the aluminum hooks. Do yourself a favor and buy this set if you want to make crocheting easier and a whole lot more comfortable, you won't be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Great value for everything that you get
customer_reviews.text: Great value for everything that you get. Keeps all of your supplies neatly organized, and the hooks are comfortable to use. It's a bit hard to get the hooks in and out of the elastic, but it's a small price to pay for the organization factor.
customer_reviews.author: ChicagoJen

customer_reviews.title: Rather have a longer hook end.
customer_reviews.text: The shank on these are too short and cause bumping with each stitch. I managed but I don’t want to use them. Nice little case though after I took all of the bulky things out of the center pouch. Handles are ok.
customer_reviews.author: AHZ

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, great customer service and great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this set! The case makes it so easy to bring with me. If I just grab this pack, grab some yarn I am good to go - no matter what project I decide to do while out, I have the hook size I need! Love the scissors and extras that come with it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Berry

customer_reviews.title: I like having all my most used hooks in one place ...
customer_reviews.text: I like having all my most used hooks in one place with scissors and stitch markers along with the other accessories. I only gave this a 4 because one hook isn't smooth so it catches on the yarn every time. It's as simple as grinding down the spot some but still an annoyance to have to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: EllieA

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Crochet Set--has everything and great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. It contains the most popular crochet hooks and the added accessories are a nice touch. The hooks are comfortable to hold and work as they should. The only issue I had was that the metal on my 5.5 mm hook was not smooth under the actual hook, so my yarn kept snagging...but it really wasn't a huge issue for me. Overall, I am super happy with the purchase. Highly recommended. :)
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Good but has strong smell
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about it except the strong chemical smell on the little bag. I am very sensitive when it comes to smell and this just throw me off.
customer_reviews.author: TheNeatyWoman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: This kit is a great value. The hooks seem to be very good quality. The case is nice to keep everything together. The kit also includes scissors (which work very well), needles, markers, tape measure, etc. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MMW

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: I just recently started crochet again. I bought these because of the ergonomic handles. The handles are fine, but my yarn doesn't slide well on them and the yarn has more of a tendency to fray then when I use tulip hooks.
customer_reviews.author: EllieS75

customer_reviews.title: Although this set is beautiful and very handy
customer_reviews.text: Although this set is beautiful and very handy, I purchased this for my elderly mother as these are advertised for arthritic hands. The hooks are comfortable, however I found them difficult to get in and out of the elastic bands, I do like that the hook size is printed in rather large dark ink on the handles for easy identification. I will either need to remove them from the case before I give them to her, or order something easier for an older person to manipulate.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara D.

customer_reviews.title: If you love the ergonomic crochet hooks, you’ll love these.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter for Christmas. She loves them, as she enjoys the ergonomic crochet hooks. She enjoys crocheting much more these days with these hooks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice little kit.
customer_reviews.text: This set has 9 different sizes of hooks. The handles may help those with arthritis or carpal tunnel (not sure as I have neither). There are also some supplies included: a measuring tape, some stitch holders, stitch markers, yarn needles, row counter, mini foldable scissors. Nice little kit.
customer_reviews.author: an honest reviewer

product_meta.title: Best Crochet Hook Set with Ergonomic Handles for Extreme Comfort. Perfect Crochet Hooks for Arthritic Hands, Smooth Knitting Needles for Superior Results & 22 Knitting Accessories for All Patterns.
feature_bullets: ❤️ENJOY CROCHETING WITHOUT PAIN OR FATIGUE! - Our soft rubber handles reduce arthritis and cramping in your hands, wrists and fingers. These crochet needles have a comfortable handle, so you can crochet for longer without discomfort.

❤️CONNECT & CARRY ON FAMILY TRADITIONS! – This kit includes everything you need to teach your kids or grandchildren to crochet. The 31 tools include 9 hooks and accessories - stitch marker, knitting markers and sewing needles.

❤️CROCHET ANYWHERE YOU'RE INSPIRED –This crochet hooks set with case is ideal for travel. The case keeps all your knitting supplies and crochet accessories organized. Ideal for travel and an easy to take your crocheting anywhere.

❤️PERFECTLY SMOOTH AND EASY TO USE! Our aluminum tips are long and smooth so yarn will not slip or snag. Keeps your yarn in place, giving nice even stitches. Every hook has a color coded plastic handle printed with both letters and numbers. Includes 9 hook sizes from B/1(2mm) to J/10(6mm).
❤️BUY WITH CONFIDENCE - We stand behind our crochet hook’s quality. Your satisfaction is our priority. If there is an issue with your crochet kit, contact us and we'll make it right for you.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars4,914 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
